section.heading: 2020 election cycle report by the District of Columbia Auditor.
section.text: No later than December 31, 2021, the District of Columbia Auditor shall prepare and submit to the Mayor and Council a report on the Fair Elections Program's performance during the 2020 election cycle. The report shall include:

para.text: An evaluation of the Fair Elections Program's performance in meeting the requirements of [add law citation];
A financial audit of the Fair Elections Program's spending during the 2020 election cycle; and
Recommendations for improving the Fair Elections Program.
